column4: I finally managed to get Azureus running without killing my machine, but the mimise to notification area fails.
Azureus just dissapears, and I have to restart it to get it to work again.
that's a bug... it's running in the background
does your router use DHCP? if it does, turn that off
have you actually set up your dynamic IP and etc?
What features are missing from OO.o compared to MSO
let's see... grammar check, MSO has way more templates, clippy (jk), vb script, etc etc etc
The grammar check failed miserably, who needs templates? vbscript isn't so major really...
and if you just compare in speed (MS Office does *NOT* use java)
For me, they run at the same speed, as under linux, the rest of my system isn't 10x as slow.
you're blinded by zealousy... ask any professional why he doesn't use OO.o
why bother with the hacks, if people want to use a crappy browser, let it render crappily too
and it didn't come with your PC did it?
but the thing is, most CPUs can decode sound as fast as a dedicated sound card
I find GNOME ugly, it's a matter of taste
